title: iConomy插件与mysql断开链接，后台报错！求助！
txt_content:
服务端1.7.10KCauldron这几天忽然后台开始报错，然后发现玩家进入退出服务器后金钱就被重置
这是错误报告：
[iConomy] Database Error: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.CommunicationsException: Communications link failure

The last packet sent successfully to the server was 0 milliseconds ago. The driver has not received any packets from the server.

重启了mysql服务和服务端一样过会儿就出现这个报错，求解！万分感谢各位大神！！！
iconomy设置的是 mysqldb连接 ，之前正常运行！
